com.mta.tehreer.text

Class TextRun

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mta.tehreer.text.TextRun

  • public class TextRun
extends java.lang.Object
    A TextRun object is a collection of consecutive glyphs sharing the same attributes and direction.

    • Method Summary

      • getAscent

        public float getAscent()
        Returns the ascent of this run. The ascent is the distance from the top of the TextRun to the baseline. It is always either positive or zero.
        Returns:
        The ascent of this run.

      • getDescent

        public float getDescent()
        Returns the descent of this run. The descent is the distance from the baseline to the bottom of the TextRun. It is always either positive or zero.
        Returns:
        The descent of this run.

      • computeWidth

        public float computeWidth(int glyphStart,
                          int glyphEnd)
        Calculates the advance width for the given glyph range in this run.
        Parameters:
        glyphStart - The index to first glyph being measured.
        glyphEnd - The index after the last glyph being measured.
        Returns:
        The advance width for the given glyph range in this run.

      • computeBoundingBox

        public android.graphics.RectF computeBoundingBox(Renderer renderer,
                                                 int glyphStart,
                                                 int glyphEnd)
        Calculates the bounding box for the given glyph range in this run. The bounding box is a rectangle that encloses the paths of this run's glyphs in the given range, as tightly as possible.
        Parameters:
        renderer - The renderer to use for calculating the bounding box. This is required because the renderer could have settings in it that would cause changes in the bounding box.
        glyphStart - The index to the first glyph being measured.
        glyphEnd - The index after the last glyph being measured.
        Returns:
        A rectangle that tightly encloses the paths of this run's glyphs in the given range.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if glyphStart is negative, or glyphEnd is greater than total number of glyphs in the run, or glyphStart is greater than glyphEnd.

      • draw

        public void draw(Renderer renderer,
                 android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
        Draws this run completely onto the given canvas using the given renderer.
        Parameters:
        renderer - The renderer to use for drawing this run.
        canvas - The canvas onto which to draw this run.

      • draw

        public void draw(Renderer renderer,
                 android.graphics.Canvas canvas,
                 int glyphStart,
                 int glyphEnd)
        Draws a part of this run onto the given canvas using the given renderer.
        Parameters:
        renderer - The renderer to use for drawing this run.
        canvas - The canvas onto which to draw this run.
        glyphStart - The index to the first glyph being drawn.
        glyphEnd - The index after the last glyph being drawn.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if glyphStart is negative, or glyphEnd is greater than total number of glyphs in the run, or glyphStart is greater than glyphEnd.
